39397533.review: This is a very polished and feature complete VR port. It's very atmospheric too.

39325848.review: Playing a puzzle game like this in VR is VERY cool. Gives you a whole different spacial awareness for your puzzle solving, and it's much lower intensity than most VR games.

39309791.review:
This is actually my first VR game that I've spent more than a week with since I've bough HTC Vive more than a year ago! Absolutely loved it! The concept of puzzle game with philosophical theme is a brilliant idea for a Vive. Talos Principle allows for a a lot of configuration be it a locomotion movement or AA settings and such. You can modify a lot of things including your height, which is very useful and should be done only once, in the beginning.
The story is told by the Voice and a lot of things must be deduced from the surroundings, I loved it very much.
Thank you Cro Team!

39257400.review:
I played the screen version and now I am playing the VR version, and I must say the VR is even better.
Sometimes the solution to puzzles comes more naturally.
The environment is particularly good to be experimented in VR. I had some cool vertigos when pursuing some stars.
The free locomotion system works great. Plenty of options to configure.
It runs flawlessly. Good fps, no crashes at all.
I give it 9/10.

39236235.review: Philosophical, powerful, beautifully-made game, and it fits VR like a glove. Excellent game/conversion Croteam, keep up the good work!

39205734.review:
USEFUL INFO: The supersampling is set in the in-game options. It will not respect what you have selected in advanced settings (assuming you use those (which you should)). For some reason it defaulted to 75% for me, and I thought this game just looked like crap until I fixed it.

Otherwise, I'm enjoying this game so far. Using the teleport locomotion, plus the puzzle solving and island settings remind me heavily of Myst from back in the day. I'll update the review once I finish. One concern is that I'm not getting anything more out of playing this in VR than I would on a monitor.

39186578.review:
Wow! A game that actually does smooth turns properly. BRAVO!

Sorry, you can read the other in depth reviews, I'm still enjoying this game right now and am not prepared to write a full review. I just wanted to let everyone know this game nails its smooth/incremental turning option. All this means is... when using the touchpad/stick to rotate the perspective, the camera's yaw axis rotates around the HMD's  position (that is, your ACTUAL position) & not the center of the playspace. So, it behaves like every game you've ever played before, which is good... because there are a TON of games that hurl you in circles around the center of your play area & cause motion sickness because they DON'T do smooth turns the way The Talos Principle DOES. So, even though I haven't played it all the way through, I'm still thrilled they did this one. little. thing.

Good job! 

If you could go ahead fill in the rest of the VR development community as to how exactly you're managing to get around the issue preventing everone from doing this... THAT WOULD BE GREAT! I mean, if it's simply a matter of "we're not using Unreal Engine"... maybe help make sure Unreal gets the dang memo.

Thanks fam ✌

39173854.review:
VRでない方のTalosはプレイしていない。このVR版からプレイしている。

[list]
    [*]VRでない版のTalosではDLCだった「Road to Gehenna（ゲヘナの道）」は、VR版では同梱されている。
    [*]ステージは美しい。これだよ！　この[b]ゾンビとか虫とか怪物とか出てこないキレイな風景をVRで見たかった[/b]んだよ！
    [*]パズルはやや難しく、歯ごたえがある。星まで集めるとなお難しい。100ステージほどあるが、1つとして前のステージと同じパターンで解決できるステージが存在しないパズル設計がすごい。どのステージでも今まで培った解法＋αが求められ、解けた時が気持ち良い。
    [*]デフォルト設定だと移動はVRゲームでよくあるテレポート式だが、オプションから[VR CONTROLS]の[MOVEMENT MODE PRESET]で[CLASSIC]を選ぶと、VRコントローラのジョイスティックで[b]自由に走り回れる[/b]ようになりおススメ。ただしVR酔いも加速する（慣れないこともない）。なお走行時は視界が狭まる。描画速度の問題もあるんだろが、VR酔いを軽減する効果もあるんだろうな、たぶん。
    [*]Oculus Touchでプレイしているが、ジャンプ用の[b]中指トリガーを両手で同時押しすると早送り[/b]になる。通常移動やエレベータの移動、Recorderでの時間稼ぎなどを早回しにできる。
    [*]VRコントローラを持ち上げて左手の甲を見ると、甲の中央にステージをリセットするボタンと、それから各ドアやアイテムを解放するための印章収集の進捗が出てくる。
    [*]高所から落ちてもダメージを受けたりはしないが、VRのリアルな風景を高速で落下するのはかなり怖い。何度やっても足元がすくむ。是非あなたも高いところからダイブしていただきたい。ゲームが進むとものすごく高い建物が出てくるので、そこから一気にイっていただきたい。
    [*]あとマイン（球状の自爆ロボ）に予期しないタイミングで突撃を食らうと迫力ありすぎてビクッとする。
    [*]それにしても２番目に難しいエンディングの、ムービーの凄まじさよ。なんかスゴいもの見たみたいな感想しか出てこない。今のところVRで見た物の中で一番素晴らしかった。
[/list]

名作ゲームの、隙のないVR化である。
シューティングばかりのVRゲームに食傷気味の諸兄におすすめしたい。楽しめる。

39131718.review: Игра просто супер. Особенно в ВР.

39109165.review: Great VR port of a great game. I'm really pleased with it.

39108683.review: This game is a masterpiece.  When I first discovered Talos Principle VR, I purchased it instantly.  Having played and loved the original, I was excited to re-visit the game and experience it from a new perspective.  As It turns out, this is hands down my favorite game of 2017 and one of my most enjoyable VR experiences to date.  Croateam just nailed it.  I have the upmost respect for them.  Some big name devs, I won’t mention names (Bethesda) are making cash grabs-porting out half assed renditions of their popular IPs, knowing good & well that they’ll hit target sales through name recognition alone. Not  Croateam.  Talos Principle VR is the result of what happens when devs actually care about creating the best experience for gamers- and one that clearly understands what makes VR great. It is the best example of a VR port I’ve ever played- so much so that it is actually an improvement to its flat predecessor.  I can not recommend this game enough.  If you like 1st person puzzle games like Portal, chances are you will enjoy this as well.  The story is interesting and has a serious tone- one that will have you reflecting about what it means to be alive- similar to West world.  VR mechanics are implemented in a thoughtful and elegant way so as to enhance the game and improve immersion without getting in the way of the core game.  The amount of control you are given over the settings options should be standard practice for ALL VR games. It is so refreshing and nice to be given the freedom to tailor everything from locomotion and color saturation to resolution and other performance tweaks.  Lastly, the amount of content you get- it took me 33 hours for both endings- and I didn’t even get all the bonus stars -not to mention finish ‘The Road to Gehenna’ is especially generous for a VR game.  Thank you Croateam for actually caring about gamers and I really hope this game does well for you.

39081386.review:
Great game!   
I spent a long time considering a purchase, due to  wondering if a puzzle game could live up to the hype.  And as soon as I started to play I realised that it could!  
Don't be like me - just buy this game now.

39065397.review: Оригинальная часть пожалуй лучше чем вр. Много человек играло в вр и постоянно застревают в открытых воротах. Игра надоедает довольно быстро.

38915042.review: Думать надо! Только начал сразу понравилась.

38915021.review: Seems like a good game, unfortunatly the VR controls are terrible. Get the regular version instead, VR just makes it worse.

38885769.review: Man, why did I take so long to buy this? The puzzle lover in me has just rejoiced! I’m only an hour in and just came across a slight stumper. Got through it but left me smiling big! Rumor is this has quite a few hours worth of playtime in it so I can already feel I’m gonna get my moneys worth. Ported from a pancake but plays extremely well. Great job!

38860220.review: Read the reviews, watched the vids, just couldn't seem to get into it... Now that I have, it's 'Just one more sigil' :)

38853663.review:
To be honest i really enjoy this game but in my opinion the port to vr is very lazy and doesn't seem to add anything to the game. I would recommend playing talos principle but the vr of the game is not as polished as i would like. The scenes where you step onto the fan and you are forced to watch your character in 3rd person fly through the air is frankly stupid and ruins immersion. Multiple times while im playing i will see clips of my body in the game. It would be so much easier to just remove the body would it not? Its not like there are any reflection of your body in the water or a mirror?

Once again nothing against the game, it is enjoyable, however unless money is burning a hole in your pocket or you are really desperate for more vr games in your library i wouldn't recommend playing this Version. Save your money and your eyes and play the original.

38833943.review: Best puzzle VR game so far, great amount of content!
